note:
You may know me from the birdsite, or you may not.
I’m a cis het (he/him) white middle aged progressive Australian who works in the technology and product space, that includes significant subject matter expertise in news media and advertising technology.
Ex-law student and reformed student politician.
Trans rights are human rights. Anyone wanting to argue whether some people shouldn’t be allowed to live as their authentic selves without harassment are not welcome.
